name: Square of Blocks
description:
How many scores can you get?
In this interesting number puzzle game, you can get enduring happiness.

Drag blocks into different tracks, and similar blocks will compose a new block with their number added

Compose a block with bigger number to get higher scores

When 1024 appears, you will get stars

3 items can be used: delete unwanted blocks, undo operation, change blocks into special ones by magics.
